name: 蔡麗珠
objective: 本課程是介紹蛋白質生化學的基本知識、功能、結構及其在生物科技上的應用。
schedule:
Introduction
Ch12 Biosignling
Ch14 Glycolysis, Gluconeogenesis
Ch14 Glycolysis, Gluconeogenesis
Ch16 The citric cycle
Ch16 The citric cycle
期中考1
Ch17. Fatty acid catabolism
Ch18, amino acid oxidation and the production of urea
Ch18, amino acid oxidation and the production of urea
Ch19 Oxidative Phosphorylation
期中考2
Ch19 Oxidative Phosphorylation
Ch20 Carbohydrate Biosynthesis in Plants and Bacteria
Ch21 Lipid Biosynthesis
Ch22 Biosynthesis of Amino acids, Nucleotides, and Related Molecules
DNA transcription/ RNA translation
期末考
scorePolicy:
學期成績：　
平時成績 20%   
期中考1 25%  
期中考2 25%  
期末考 30%
materials:
Lehninger Principles of Biochemistry (WORTH )
Molecular Cell Biology (FREEMAN)
分子生物學(藝軒)
